summary:
Small Home near Fort Greymoor in Whiterun.
Vanilla follower Stare at home.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#00ff00][size=5][b]Small Home[/b][/size][/color]

[color=#ff00ff][size=4][b]Description:[/b][/size][/color]
[size=2]Double & Single beds for you and your followers at the 3rd floor.Â 
Craftings, Chest, Books and more...

You can fast travel after discovering the Stare's House.
[/size]
[b][color=#ffff00][size=3]Location:[/size][/color][size=2][color=#ffff00] Small Home near Fort Greymoor in Whiterunhold.[/color]
[/size][/b]
[size=2]Follower Stare at home. She is home-owner.

She has farm clothes at home but she wears draugr armor when fighting.

She is essential, marriageable, unaggressive and foolhardy.

[b]Class[/b]: Warrior 1 hand & Human magic
[b]Race[/b]: Nord
[b]Voice Type[/b]: Female Young Eager
[/size][b]Spells[/b]: Fireball, firebolt, fast healing, heal other, flames, lightningbolt and sparks
[b]Perks[/b]: Alteration, Destruction
[b]Height[/b]: 1.0, Weight: 0.0
[b]Speed[/b]: 120
[b]Health[/b]: 500, Stamina: 400, Magicka: 300

[b][color=#ff00ff][size=4]Used Mods on Screen Shots[/size][/color][/b]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709]Dimonized UNP Female body[/url] by [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/537675?tab=user+files]dimon99[/url]
